reviews.review: Half-Life gerçekten eski oyun kim oynayacak deyip geçilmeyecek bir oyun ben ilk oynadığım oyun cs 1.5 e tabi bunun yanında Half-Lifedir oynarken kendimi bulduğum sayılı oyundan biridir ama küçüklüğümde oynadım ve oyun sektörünün devamıyla tanıştım e ozaman haliyle ismini unutmuştum ama yıllar sonra bu yıl alıp oynadığımda zamanımız modern oyunlarının çoğundan daha çok sarıp daha çok eğlendirdiğini farkettim yani uzun lafın kısası Half-Life'yi sizlere şiddetle tavsiye ederim...VEDE umutmadan umarız HALF-LİFE 3 gelir gaben reis

Valve tarafında üretilen birinci şahıs nişancı bilim-kurgu video oyunu hani zamanının en iyisi öncüsü derler ya Half-Life da öyle bişey işte FPS türünün atası oyun dünyasına yeni bir çağ açan o güzel oyun fazla söze gerek yok kahramanlar gelir geçer fakat efsaneler kalıcıdır.

After replaying this game several times since the first time I wrote this review (with less than 9 hours of playtime and admittedly cheating through the tougher parts), I've learned that this game truly is much greater than I initially thought.

If you are experienced with modern singleplayer first-person shooters, then I want you to think about mechanics that have stuck with you, either for good or bad reasons and keep those in mind when playing this game. Because, as you play through this game, you'll notice some of those mechanics and how this game does it much better than most modern first person shooters despite being one of the first to do it.

I mean, modern titles are supposed to refine and perfect mechanics that older video games tend to misuse, either because of limitations or bad design. Yet in this 800 megabyte 1998 FPS there's much better and more memorable gameplay than in 60-100 gigabyte current day shooters.

This game is definitely not perfect, though. I found the chapter "On a Rail" to be awfully tedious, confusing and slow and the Xen chapters are a mess that even Gabe Newell regrets to this day. And the soldier AI, while it works great for the most part, can be easily exploited by simply throwing grenades, as their "run away from grenades" AI takes priority over everything else, even if the grenade is nowhere near them and usually still lingers after the grenade has exploded.

Still, though, this is a game that you should definitely try. It's a must play on Hard, but you can do a first playthrough in an easier difficulty to get familiar with the game and its mechanics first.

Este juego es un clásico, si no lo tienes no se a que esperas. Half Life es un juego, que aparte de tener una maravillosa historia y mecánicas, ofrece miles de oportunidades para disfrutarlo más todavía.

[HISTORIA]
No tiene desperdicio. Te mantiene atento y es bastante entretenida con un montón de escenarios distintos. A lo largo del juego también encuentras distintas armas para seguir progresando. A parte, también irás encontrándote con nuevas criaturas y enemigos que harán que alcanzar tu objetivo sea más difícil.

[MILES DE POSIBILIDADES]
Respecto a todas las oportunidades que tiene, hay miles y miles de mods para este juego, con los que puedes experimentar otras historias (Echoes, C.A.G.E.D, entre otros), cosas absurdas (hay miles, enserio), adiciones al juego original (como Brutal Half Life).

[MECÁNICAS]
Las mecánicas son fluidas y divertidas, personalmente me paso haciendo Bunny hop todo el día xd.

[NO TE DEJES ENGAÑAR POR LOS GRÁFICOS!!!!]
Que los gráficos no te engañen, puede que no sean lo mejor del mundo, pero aún así son bastante buenos para cuando salió el juego.

Así que, no se qué haces dudando, compra compra compra compra. En serio, no te arrepentirás :D
Тут и так все понятно,классика 1998 года,должны попробовать эту игру,прошел только недавно и получил массу удовольствия от старой,но доброй игры!

Summary:
This game is good. No its great! But not perfect. The graphics though great for a game from 1998, havent aged well at all, and playing at 1080p makes most textures very blurry. The shooting part (Since this game is a First person Shooter) Isnt very good at all. I rarelt saw my bullets hit any of the enemies even with my crosshair on them. The shooting is pretty terrible. But thats not what the game is about. The game is more about thinking than shooting, and you'll find yourself solving puzzles to progress. Some puzzles are good, but most of them will leave you running around like an idiot until you realize what to do. But Even with that the game is still really good. 

Gameplay: 
Gameplay is pretty good, but the shooting cant go pass unchecked. The shooting isnt very good, and is downright annoying and very frusterating. But even with that the pacing is fantastic and youll be addicted, Trust me! (8.5/10)

Presentation: 
The presentation in this game is absolutely fantastic! The intro does an amazing job at immersing you into the world and learning about the story. Though it can be a bit Slow... (9.5/10) 

Graphics: 
Honestly Graphics havent aged well. For what was a game from 1998, this game wouldve looked amazing for its time. But now it looks crummy. There are multiple points were the textures overlap. Im not saying graphics are everything, but they can be a visual disturbance at times. (7.5/10)

Sound: 
Sound is good. Just good because the barely isnt much sound. Music only settles in certain parts of the game, creating a creepy and mysterious atmosphere. It fits the games theme perfectly! Its pretty amazing! Ofcourse, Sound effects are good too, but i noticed some gun sounds to be too loud, and some enemy sounds are very annoying. (8/10)

Overall Score: 
In all honest ill give this game an 8.5/10, It was a great game for its time, but alot of its faults are overlooked like the shooting and graphics which havent aged so well. But the presentation, level design, and pacing are fantastic, and is a blast to play. 

Score: 8.5/10!

Half-Life é um absoluto clássico de jogos de tiro. Nele, você controla Gordon Freeman, um cientista que trabalha em um laboratório de uma empresa chamada Black Mesa. Lá, um experimento dá errado e Gordon é forçado em uma odisseia pelo  gigantesco laboratório, que é invadido por aliens e diversas facções do mundo que tentam conter o desastre.

O jogo é velho. Foi lançado originalmente em 1998. Se você se importa com os gráficos, recomendo esperar até dezembro para jogar Black Mesa, um remake do game. 

+Pontos Positivos
+A inteligência artificial do jogo é realmente impressionante. Os soldados inimigos, por exemplo, são espertos e lançam granadas em momentos táticos e te flanqueiam sem dó, usando diversas estratégias.

+Há uma grande variedade de armas. Você usará armas comuns, como pistolas e shotguns, usará armas experimentais divertidas, algumas armas de tecnologia alien e até mesmo aliens vivos!

+A história, apesar de simples, possui diversos elementos complexos e enigmáticos. Esse é um game que te dá tantas perguntas quanto te dá respostas, e é sempre divertido criar teorias.

+O jogo em si dá muita satisfação e diversão a quem joga. Os momentos cheios de adrenalina com diversos inimigos em um campo massivo e os puzzles inteligentes são quase sempre divertidos e dão uma satisfação enorme após serem terminados.

+A gameplay é muito fluida. Tem telas de loading infrequentes e extremamente rápidas, um FPS consistente, o jogo é linear mas tem um senso de exploração também muito forte.

+Apesar dos gráficos datados, a imersão do jogo é boa demais. O controle total de Gordon no jogo inteiro, mais a inexistência de cutscenes ajuda muito a imersão.

-Pontos Negativos

-Sinceramente, algumas partes do jogo tem um design de fase completamente horrível. As partes finais do game, em particular, usam inimigos em massa, junto com uma dificuldade artificial gigante, confundindo o jogador em labirintos horríveis sem nenhuma pista para onde ir e com falta de munição e vida. Algumas partes do jogo são simplesmente chatas para *******. Embora isso, a maioria do game tem fases boas, mas quando há fases ruins, elas são quase insuportáveis.

-Há uma inconsistência de dificuldade. Algumas partes do jogo são difíceis demais e não são divertidas, mas apenas frustrantes, enquanto outras são fáceis demais.

-Em diversas partes do jogo, a movimentação de alguns lugares para o outro não é nem um pouco intuitiva. Recomendo você aprender muito os controles do jogo para não ficar preso em algum lugar que não parece conseguir avançar. Isso também é presente em alguns outros jogos da Valve, como Portal 2.

-Essa é mais uma reclamação da série inteira: Você, se gostar do game, vai jogar os outros Half-Life. Infelizmente, Half-Life 2: Episode Two terminou em um cliffhanger e a Valve deixou a sequela completamente na mão para se focar em jogos multiplayer que dão dinheiro mais fácil, como Dota 2 e CS. Isso faz com que a história fique incompleta e desaponte quem quer um desfecho decente que explica a história direito.

Conclusão: Half-Life é um ótimo jogo, mas possui alguns defeitos notáveis, e quem gostou vai se decepcionar com o desfecho terrível da série apenas por uma certa ganância da Valve, que nunca lançou e certamente nunca lançará o Episode Three.

Me llevé una sorpresa al jugar este título, y es que a pesar de su antigüedad logra muy buenos script, sorprendiéndome en algunas partes. No se vuelve monótono en ningún momento y te mantiene dentro del personaje. Recomiendo poner atención en el entorno en que se desenvuelve la historia, pues al no poseer pausas entre los capítulos uno no se da cuenta de lo que está realmente sucediendo. 
Recomendado si te gustan los clásicos o también si quieres jugar lo que catapultó a valve al éxito.

Plus sérieusement, ce premier opus de la saga désormais culte Half-Life ist un bonheur àparcourir, même actuellement. Le seul petit problème (vraiment mineur) est que le multi est assez "secondaire". Je ne joue à ce jeu que pour son solo, j'ai juste essayé le versus une fois et ça m'a ennuyé :/ Ca et sa bande-son, pas toujours adaptée à la situation (surtout au générique de fin)

Sinon, go jouer à Half-Life, la durée de vie étant très bonne (environ une dizaine, voire vaingtaine d'heure), la jouabilité ecellente est nerveuse, les graphismes sont franchement pas mal pour 1998, et le prix est à 1 euro pendant les soldes. Si c'est pasdonné, franchement...

Un véritable classique, qui est arrivé sur la scène du jeu vidéo, a posé ses bails, et continue à être un jeu qui mérite l'attention en repensant à toutes les nouveautés qu'il a apporté y'a 20 ans. Sauf la lampe torche quasi inutile et frustrante à utiliser ( coucou le point de lumière créé à l'endroit où l'on vise et du coup n'éclaire pas tout le temps face au joueur ) , point sur lequel la version Source est revenue.

Un juego clásico y de los que le dieron gran importancia al FPS y a las buenas historias, este juego es bastante bueno, tiene una historia buena y satisfactoria, pero es un juego en el que quizá debas de morir muchas veces para aprender de tus errores, además de que te obliga a poner en funcionamiento tu razonamiento e inteligencia además de tus habilidades por qué no tiene nada para guiarte mas que tu instinto, sabiduría y la observación del entorno, esto es bastante bueno ya que te obliga a meterte en el juego y a comprender lo que estas haciendo, los controles son bastantes buenos aunque creo que son bastante sensibles y nuestro personaje podría caer sin querer apenas rozando la tecla para avanzar, pero no deja de ser un buen título bastante recomendable.

Although I do recomend you play this game I will not reitterate the positive aspects of this game because there is nothing positive about this game that hasn't already been said a million times over the past 20 years. I thought it was a great game. I had fun from start to finish, but there are two things that I was very disappointed in and felt I should share.

1. The slippery movement is damn near unbearable at times. It adds a challenge to the game in the same way playing blindfolded would add a challenge. I couldn't make it 5 minutes without the slippery movement causing me to pull my hair out. Very frustrating to say the least.

2. The story telling wasn't what I expected from such a critically acclaimed game. To be honest I didn't even know what was going on most of the time. I've finished the game and I still don't know what the hell happened. I'm gonna have to do some reading. 

Again, I had a blast and I would recommend this game. Just beware that the movement is a nightmate and you may easily miss plot elements if you aren't paying close attention.

今更だけど6.7年前かな。。 初めてやったFPS。
たしかPC2でだったかな？とても楽しめた。 
そしてSteam版を改めて購入。

久しぶりのFPS。最初の1週間は5分でFPS酔い。
吐き気と頭痛に悩みつつ
段々と時間が伸びて、30分、60分と酔わなくなり、
今ではあまり酔わなくなった。最初が辛い＞＜

FPSは酔うし、アクションも苦手で、
ずっと敬遠していたけど、謎解き？的な要素が
あり、気が付いたらのめりこんでいた感じ。

そもそものアクションがまったくダメなので
チートを使用して無敵状態でクリア。w

アクション要素を取り除いて謎解き特化。w
それでもすごく面白いと感じた。

この流れでHalf Life2へなだれ込んだのは
言うまでもなく。

Un gran juego que a pesar de algunos bugs (se mezclaron las partidas guardadas perdiendo 2 o 3 horas de juego) y controles algo toscos en las partes de plataformeo,  sigue siendo un juego espectacular con una inteligencia artificial en los enemigos que perfectamente podría se de hoy en día y una dificultad con la que tendrás algunos momentos retantes (por lo menos si seleccionas el modo difícil).

    En resumen, se trata de un juego muy completo en el que se mezclan zonas de disparo, de plataformas, de puzzles tanto por separado como todo junto mientras vives una historia interesante de ciencia ficción. A esto se le puede añadir que si tienes una tostadora de ordenador este juego, en mi opinión se convierte automáticamente en un obligatorio para tu biblioteca.

This is considered a classic, but is it still playable today? I have played the singleplayer without any mods or cheats, and according to me, it is.
This is an old game, so you have to, among ohter things, look past the dated graphics. If you do, you can still notice what a masterpiece this was back in the day and understand its high metacritic score.

There are countless detailed reviews of this game, so I keep it short.
If you never played this game, you should give it a try. I did it and enjoyed it.
But, as with most (old) games, you should buy this during a sale.

Легенда, слова просто излишни. Сколько раз захожу в игру, сколько раз её перепрохожу, она просто не надоедает. Конечно нынишнему поколению не понять, почему эта игра так захватывает, и все будут осуждать её из-за графики и всякого рода физики, но скажу одно даже в 2017 году эта игра по всем показателям войдёт в топ 50, а в те времена она занимала первое место более 8 лет. Легендарная сага от Valve не перестаёт удивлять. Спасибо вам за этот шедевр!

I didn't play this series in order, I played HL2 first and the following episodes, then I played HL1. Doing this I feel I didn't enjoy HL1 as much as I would have as I already knew the plot and how it would unfold however, that is not saying I didn't extremely enjoy this game, it was great!

I'll make this short and leave you with this:

-If you only want to play for the gameplay I would recommend HL2. The gameplay of HL1 is very good but is just slightly worse than HL2 in my opinion. It is things such as the AI, graphics and fewer bugs that makes HL2 better gameplay-wise and immersion-wise IMO.

-If you want to play for the story as well then I would definitely recommend playing the games in order (where applicable). It means that you get to [i]see[/i] how the plot unfolds and you get to play more HL games!

[b]Conclusion[/b]
The HL series is an extremely good series. Throughout the games there is always different things happening and new enemies to face so you never get bored. There are some parts where you may be unsure of what to do and will have to search on YouTube or somewhere else, but these are rare. The game is very different to any other sort of shooter I have played and definitely recommend it to people who like any sort of shooter/action games.

Half life cuenta la historia de Gordon Freeman, un cientifico e investigador con renombre, que debido a  mala praxis en el trabajo, trae al mundo alienigenas de otro planeta, forzandolo a formarse como paramilitar a fin de extinguir la horda extraterestre.
[h1] 9/10[/h1]
Juegazo!

Half-Life is a first person shooter gamer developed by Valve Software on the GoldSrc engine. It follows the exploits of physicist Gordon Freeman after he accidentally jumpstarts the end of the world because he was late to work. Sort of.

So Half-Life is another one of those games that people hold on their shoulders and parade as a masterpiece. Like Psychonauts, or the following Half-Lives, people call it out for its great writing and clever gameplay and the like. For Psychonauts, I really did agree with the praise, it's a genuinely good game. For Half-Life 2, I thought the hype was slightly heavy handed, but I still really like it. Half-Life 1 is different.

The thing about Half-Life is, there are certain things that really totally gell with me and certain things that don't. I like how it feels like a B-Movie crossbred with Lovecraftian Eldritch style horror. I like how they took a lot of risks with what they could get away with in a "Shooter" game, like puzzles and prolonged "Nah who even needs guns" scenes. I like that guy who's all like "Why oh why do we have to wear these RIDICULOUS ties?!" he's fantastic. I like to imagine the scientist who teleports you in the lambda complex, up on the balcony, is the disgruntled tie guy. I picture him fighting tooth and nail just like Gordon did to get to the Lambda complex after the cascade.

I actually like almost all of the gameplay decisions. I think the platforming bits are overly critiqued, I quite liked them. I also thought the Xen portion was absolutely lovely, it's a great and stressful culmination of the previous 10-ish hours of gameplay, (at least that's how long it took me to beat it but I was taking my time and this was a first time playthrough). I also liked the final boss, I thought he was gleefully terrifying looking and I like how the final setpeice takes some level of exploration and a degree of critical thinking for your surroundings. 

Wasn't a big fan of those floaty brain enemies that shooting homing balls of yellow glowing dust, what were they supposed to be doing? Also thought the pacing, which is commonly revered as incredibly solid, could have used some work. Often times fights and set-peices lost their "UMPH" idk what it is. A guy shows up and then I shoot him and then he dies and then I move on. The canned running and dying animations don't help with this weird sensation either. It sort of feels like Gordon is kinda drifting around in a hazy dreamlike state of zappy noises and radiochatter overset by staticy low quality 90's game noises. That being said the weapons are punchy and the AI is challenging...it's good action, for sure, but something about it rubs me the wrong way.

Really great level design though. It really flows nicely and the puzzles are non-intrusive and make logical sense. They don't feel like puzzles half the time and that's appreciated. Something feels a lot grittier about the "one step at a time" storytelling here too, moreso than it even would in the sequels which often get lost in their more fantastic sensibilities. I also loved the tone of the story, B-Movie horror underset by lovecraftian demons from another dimension. Brilliant. I love how the scientists have the ramble scene at the end and theres a mid-point climax with the portal and they explain the nonsense science to you all straightlaced and stiffly, the game doesn't drop the b-movie edge even at the end. It's great. I love it.

In the end, Half-Life is a surprisingly good game. If you're like me and can easily look past shoddy graphic-capabilities and appreciate great graphics utilization than you'll probably agree that the game has actually aged pretty well, too. It's also dirt cheap so there's no excuse not to get it.
Half-Life? The game is rife (with good stuff)

Despite being almost 20 years old, Half-Life still manages to catch me in a shallow story, but fast-paced, and sometimes even hard, game environment. Beat the game once before, then bought it for Steam, and I beat it again, having lots of fun (which is what matters after all) and actually realising this is the best FPS I've played so far. A must-play for every gamer, that achieves feats still in 2017, by hooking lots of players with ease.

Kozmoz'umuzdaki en iyi FPS oyunu HL'dir, Evren ve kainatın şahit olduğu en iyi FPS-Shooter oyunudur kendileri, HL3 hürmetine oyunu almanız kesinlikle farzdır, en azından Valve'nin kapalı musluklarını açmasını sağlamalıyız, bu sayede asıl amacımız olan HL3'e erişebiliriz(Göremedi(Öldü)) 

MP'si size ömür boyu yetecektir hatta ilk zamanlar kütüphanesinde sadece HL olanlar vardı 4-5k saat vesaire, alıcağınız 1k ya da 8k oyunun veremedeğini keyfi size verebilecek ender oyunlardandır, Yine CS gibi üstünde nice nesiller yetişti kimisi doktor kimisi mühendis kimisi çöpcü oldu, kimisi hala öğrenci ama tek bir şeyleri değişmedi, Oyuna olan bakışları...

Evrensel bir oyun yaptığınızda herkes tarafından anlaşılabilir ve kabul edilebilir bir oyun haline geliyor ve insanlar yaptığınız çalışmaya sizden fazla sahip çıkıyor bu da yapan bireyi ya da grubu mutlu ediyor,gururlandırıyor...

Ki gurur duyulması gerekilen bir oyun Valve için fazlasıyla hak ediyor bu konumunu, Steam'in var olma sebebi ve bizim ya da benim burda özgürce inceleme yazabiliyor olmamıza neden olan oyun olmasını saymıyorum bile... Gerisini düşünün öncesini,şimdisini ve sonrasını, Half-Life yarım kalan bir hayatın devamıdır kimisi için kimisi için de yarıda bırakılan bir hikayenin ta kendisidir...

Oynanılması gerekilenler listenizde 1.nci sırada olmayı fazlasıyla hakediyor.

Alın oynayın beğenmezseniz yorumlarda belirtin ve bu psikolojik sorunun çözümü için size tavsiyeler falan vereyim vesaire...

I'd recommend it to everyone valuing the quality games that are gentle to your hardware resources. High framerate and no lag on ASUS EEE PC.
What else can I say, It's half life. It's obviously good.

Il gioco è da giocare, perchè comunque è un fps estremamente godibile ed interessante ancora oggi, ma io l'ho trovato deludente sotto vari punti di vista, dato che moltissimi in rete me l'hanno spacciato come il videogioco migliore di sempre. Attenzione, non è un brutto gioco, tant'è che lo consiglio; ma Half life ha molti problemi, alcuni dovuti ai 20 anni che si porta sulle spalle, e li nulla da dire, ma molte altre sono semplici cazzate! (Ben 2 volte sono dovuto ricorrere a cheat, ed almeno il doppio ho dovuto ricaricare i salvataggi; dati svariati bug che rendevano impossibile la prosecuzione, tra cui uno capitato più volte per il quale non riuscivo a saltare abbastanza in alto per superare certi "gradini" necessari).


In poche parole: Bel gioco, da provare. Però andateci con i piedi di piombo, perchè l'aura di gioco perfetto che si porta dietro potrebbe davvero deludervi e rovinarvi l'esperienza
